lines.text: I did it, Master! I did good, didn't I?
[laughs]
Yes, Toad. Now, make yourself useful, go play in an airlock!
[first lines]

Welcome. This is Stan Lee of Marvel Comics, warning you to look around you. Your classmates, your friends. You never know which one of them may be a mutant. A person born with strange and wonderous powers. Now, some mutants like the X-Men, use their special gifts for good. But, then there are the terrorist mutants, who plan to destroy the human race.
[last lines]

Yes, the X-Men have won. But, only for now. Magneto is still out there, waiting, planning, plotting the destruction of the human race. But, whatever the challenge, whatever the peril, the X-Men will be there!
You can come out now. You were told to remain at the Mansion.
I couldn't. It's my fault Magneto has the power circuit. I've got to help stop him!
What you plan to do is very dangerous.
I have to help! The world Magneto wants to destroy is MY world too! Oh, Professor, wish me luck!
[goes into space]
Good luck, my dear. Good luck to us all.
This is where you stop. Nothing can move The Blob!
And I wouldn't dream of trying. Auf Wiedersehen.
What's wrong Charlie? No warm welcome for your dear step-brother?
You've always been welcome in my home Kane. It's your choice of friends I question.
Men are so helpless against the mental powers of The White Queen.
How do you know what I can do? The things you mentioned in the letter... Nobody knows! Not even my parents.
G-day! Welcome to Asteroid M. Don't you just love a good bar-be?
Leave this one to the Dazzler! You guys go on.
Ugh! What is that?
That is Nightcrawler. Nightcrawler has mastered the art of line-of-sight teleportation.
Is GOOD Little One. Colossus like rain.
The kid stays here. She'll just get in the way.
I will not! And stop calling me a kid! I am 14 years old!
You fool! Do you have any idea of what you've just done?
Yes! I've just stopped a mad-man from destroying the Earth. And now Scorpio will destroy this base instead!
It's about to get windy. Hang on everyone!
When the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants gets through, humans will no longer have a place on planet Earth!
Rrrawww! Get with it! The X-men don't have room for whiny brats!
Who are you calling whiny? I'll show you! I'll...
Hold it, Kitty! Wolverine may not be Mr. Sunshine, but he isn't the enemy.
Let the hostages go, Pyro. This doesn't concern them!
Wrong, Ruby Eyes. In two days, it'll concern every human on Earth.
Hello, Nightcrawler. Fascinating, isn't it? Earth shall be destroyed in precisely three minutes.
Not if I can help it!
Ah, but you can't. No one can.
I am Magneto. Release me. I command it!
Well, Wolverine, you were against Kitty being a member of the team. What do you think, now?
Rrrawww, so the kid got lucky. That don't make her an X-Man.
[under his breath]
Not yet.
